briefTitle: Open Label Immunotherapy Trial for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Open Label, One-arm, 3-month Study of Once-daily Tablet of V3-MOMMO as Immunotherapy of Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Confirmed diagnosis of breast cancer positive at least for CEA tumor marker at above normal threshold level

Exclusion Criteria:

* Mastectomy
